meanings.definition: Open to doubt or challenge; uncertain.
meanings.sent1: The weather forecast was questionable, so I brought an umbrella just in case.
meanings.sent2: Her decision to quit her job without a backup plan was questionable.
meanings.sent3: It was questionable whether the cat would actually catch the laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: The old map was so faded and torn that its accuracy was questionable.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious package left on the doorstep raised questionable suspicions.

meanings.sent1: The salesman's questionable tactics made me wary of his intentions.
meanings.sent2: The politician's questionable past came to light during the election campaign.
meanings.sent3: It was questionable whether the student's excuse for not doing homework was true.
meanings.sent4: The company's questionable practices were exposed by an investigative journalist.
meanings.sent5: The movie's questionable content caused controversy among viewers.
